actions.description: 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) force damage, or 6 (2d4 + 1) force damage if the fractal is Medium or bigger.
actions.name: Quantum Strike

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak
name: Fractal Mascot

specialTraits.description: The fractal can move through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.
specialTraits.name: Relative Density
